verbose_text: Over the past two decades, and despite fluctuations in the commercial profile of oil based industries, it became an accepted paradigm that, due to the Worldwide dependence on crude oil and the depletion of other non renewable energy sources, coupled with the negative effects of global warming, it is necessary to find ways of producing the required energy supply in an environmentally sustainable way.2 This has generated interest and investment into carbon capture and storage, in a bid to reduce industrial CO 2 emissions.
